price: 9. Y a Al-lah Le corresponde mostrar el buen camino; y los hay que conducen al extravío.Y si Al-lah hubiese querido, os habría guiado a todos.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you
